topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ebdb5b6368726d09303000#post_54ebdb5b6368726d09303000
What's the difference between wine and grape juice then?
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ebdbd163687246a2fa0500#post_54ebdbd163687246a2fa0500
Grape Juice: Depending on the Grapes mainly the Purple one are good for you.

Wine:No matter what will have Alcohol unit. Plus they do stuff with the Grapes. Also depending on the color of Grapes, green is mostly used for White wines. And purple will make a Red Wine.

Also one is sweeter.
topics.author: 505696b47f123b37e800effa
